course.title: Powerful Personal Brand
course.description: A 16-week intensive program to transform your brand and visibility

weeks.title: Week 1: Introduction to Personal Branding
weeks.description: Learn the fundamentals of personal branding and why it matters
weeks.content:
Welcome to Week 1

This week we'll cover the fundamentals of personal branding...

Key Topics:

  • What is personal branding?
  • Why it matters for your business
  • Getting started with your brand identity
